content.question: Which of the following best describes how European labor systems before 1450 differed from the Chinese labor system depicted in the two images?

choices.label: European labor systems did not rely as much on women and children.
European labor systems placed a greater emphasis on plantation cash crops.
European labor systems were dominated by urban artisans.
European labor systems were more likely to utilize serfdom.

content.answer: European labor systems were more likely to utilize serfdom.
